Question: This person hosted the August 17 edition of British comedy- variety show The Friday Night Project.
Hints: This person got his big break in the year 2000, when he began to produce for artists on Roc-A-Fella Records.
1 "Hottest MC in the Game." On December 17, 2010, this person was voted as the MTV Man of the Year by MTV.
Watch the Throne, a collaborative studio album by this person and Jay-Z, was released by Def Jam Recordings on August 8, 2011.
